name: Vortex FC
review: well organized and great place to relax  all amenities are great  clean and well kept  staff if friendly and professional   drawbacks    expensive food  ie 1 cup of latte is 10500 00 won   pool music too loud   bakery offers limited choices

name: Dai-Hoon Lee
review: good golf course  service   facility

name: Chris
review: i wanted to find out their rates  so i checked out their website  and  it was all in korean  which made it difficult for me to navigate their site  so  i called them instead  the guy who answered my call told me to phone a different number  when i did  i was told that somebody will get back to me promptly  it took a while for that person to call back  and  i honestly did not think the service was great  the cheapest room for a non member is in the 300 000 won range  which is quite expensive  and  the only way for a non member to make a reservation is over the phone  how inconvenient

name: Alex Kim
review: the recent renovation was a big success as this was one of the best multi room suites i ever stayed outside of seoul  be ready to pay up if you intend to use the pool and hot springs  they charge separately and is quite pricey  but restaurant price was reasonable and convenience store on the premise is indeed very convenient

name: Jack Son
review: you don t need membership card for booking a room very good sweet room  290 day 3rooms 2bathrooms but they don t allow cooking in hotel

name: Hwiyoung Kim
review: wow place  if you can get a chance to book a spot  just go there  the best place that i have ever been

name: Dotte
review: very exciting and beautiful golf course

name: Yong Lee
review: nice resort with spa and pool  located near donghae sea   air condition is super

review: price to use the pool and spa is a complete joke  will never come back

review: i used it only in the hot spring sauna  it wasn t large  but it had a sophisticated atmosphere  the hot water in the open air bath was well maintained  and there was a chair right next to it  which was nice  i still want to use it
